extDescription.message: An easy-to-use blog editor lets you easily post to all of your blogs.

entry_new_label.description: The label that appears in the entries list to designate a new post.

entry_localDraft_label.description: The label that is prepended to drafts that are saved on the user's computer.

entry_draft_label.description: The label that is prepended to drafts that are saved on the user's blog.

entry_scheduled_label.description: The label that is prepended to posts that have been scheduled but not yet published.
